cb_cloud_provider.name: Cloud Provider
cb_cloud_provider.description_html: A provider of cloud services e.g., Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

attribute_filter_map_query.cloud_provider_id: SELECT cloud_provider_id FROM modw_public_cloud.cloud_providers WHERE cloud_provider_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_cloud_provider.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.cloud_providers WHERE cloud_provider_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY display

cb_location.name: Cloud Location
cb_location.description_html: The geographical location where cloud providers cluster data centers to provide services.

attribute_filter_map_query.cloud_provider_id: SELECT location_id FROM modw_public_cloud.locations WHERE location_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_location.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.locations WHERE location_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name

cb_service.name: Cloud Service
cb_service.description_html: The particular cloud provider service on which funds spent money.

attribute_filter_map_query.service_id: SELECT service_id FROM modw_public_cloud.services WHERE service_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_service.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.services WHERE service_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_sub_service.name: Cloud Sub-Service
cb_sub_service.description_html: Within each cloud service there may be one or more sub-services that are charged at different rates (e.g., when using AWS's EC2 service, in addition to being charged for instance time, you are also charged for data transfer, file storage etc. These are seen as sub-services of the EC2 service).

attribute_filter_map_query.service_id: SELECT sub_service_id FROM modw_public_cloud.sub_services WHERE sub_service_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_sub_service.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.sub_services WHERE sub_service_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_account.name: Cloud Provider Account
cb_account.description_html: A cloud provider specific financial account that is charged for usage.

attribute_filter_map_query.account_id: SELECT account_id FROM modw_public_cloud.accounts WHERE account_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_account.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT id AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.accounts WHERE account_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY id

cb_nairrproject.name: NAIRR Project
cb_nairrproject.description_html: The NAIRR Project associated with the cloudbank fund.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT fund_id FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_nairrproject.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT project_id AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY title

cb_fund.name: Fund
cb_fund.description_html: The fund that spent money on public cloud services. Money is deposited into a fund from which it is dispersed to cloud-specific accounts to cover charges for usage.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT fund_id FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_fund.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT title AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY title

cb_funder.name: Funding Source
cb_funder.description_html: The organization that provided the money for a fund to spend on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT funder_id FROM modw_public_cloud.funders WHERE funder_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_funder.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.funders WHERE funder_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi.name: CloudBank PI
cb_pi.description_html: The principal investigator on the fund that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_person_id: SELECT person_id FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name

cb_pi_institution.name: Fund PI Institution
cb_pi_institution.description_html: The primary institution of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_id: SELECT institution_id FROM modw_public_cloud.institutions WHERE institution_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.institutions WHERE institution_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_nsf_directorate.name: Funding Agency Directorate
cb_nsf_directorate.description_html: The NSF Directorate associated with the Fund this spend occurred under.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT nsf_directorate_id FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_directorates WHERE nsf_directorate_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_nsf_directorate.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_directorates WHERE nsf_directorate_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_nsf_division.name: Funding Agency Division
cb_nsf_division.description_html: The NSF Division associated with the Fund this spend occurred under.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT nsf_division_id FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_divisions WHERE nsf_division_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_nsf_division.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_divisions WHERE nsf_division_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_field_of_science.name: Field of Science
cb_field_of_science.description_html: The branch of science under which a fund's research falls.

attribute_filter_map_query.field_of_science_id: SELECT field_of_science_id FROM modw_public_cloud.fields_of_science WHERE field_of_science_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_field_of_science.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.fields_of_science WHERE field_of_science_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name

cb_co_pi.name: Co-PI
cb_co_pi.description_html: A co-principal investigator on the fund that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT person_id FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_co_pi.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name

cb_manager.name: Manager
cb_manager.description_html: A manager on the fund under which with this spend occurred.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT person_id FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_manager.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name
